display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ol.li: We define the path at which the zip will be stored
We name the folder in which the zip will be unzipped
We unzip the file in the folder

switch.text: We define the path at which the zip will be storedWe do...
